page.title: 07HOUSES IN AUCHNAGATT.
page.content: As a part of our Domesday Project we have to find out about "Houses in Auchnagatt". There aren't any housing estates in Auchnagatt.There are just two small streets of Council houses. Some peoples' houses are also used for business.Jacky Brown's house he's an Electrician,George Taylor uses part of his house as a shop.The Post Office and the hotel,all of these are used for buisness. Just past the Council houses,oppisite the playing field there are some separate houses most of them have different styles.One house has a mansard roof 2 houses have pointed windows and the others are the same.There are about 6 council houses in 1 row just left of the school. There are not many houses in Auchnagatt.
